greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sigma_0(n) - 2 - (omega(n) - 1) * nu(n), where sigma_0 = A000005, nu = A001221, omega = A001222.
comment: Conjecture: All terms are nonnegative except for a(1) = -1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: The positions of positive terms are conjectured to be A320632.
Positions of first appearances are A328963.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 02 2019. The idea for this sequence came from _Mats Granvik_.
